Line 39: Line 39:
Although virtually all human [[society|societies]] condemn sexual activity with the dead as a form of symbolic disrespect, several groups, individuals, and publications have pushed for the legalization of necrophilic acts. "The NecroErotic," for example, argues that "necrophiliacs have as much right to engage in their [[orgasm]]ic release of choice as do 'normal' [living] couples," and that "all '[[human rights|rights]]' cease the moment a person draws his or her last breath."
Although virtually all human [[society|societies]] condemn sexual activity with the dead as a form of symbolic disrespect, several groups, individuals, and publications have pushed for the legalization of necrophilic acts. "The NecroErotic," for example, argues that "necrophiliacs have as much right to engage in their [[orgasm]]ic release of choice as do 'normal' [living] couples," and that "all '[[human rights|rights]]' cease the moment a person draws his or her last breath."
  +   +
Necrophilia is not [[Image:RAPE.gif|left]]
  +   +
There have been many court rulings worldwide that have punished the offender for their activities based on a lack of consensuality. However, they are seldom punished for full-blown <b>raep.</b> Therefore, although there may be problems with consensuality for the dead, in general, <i>it is not rape if they are dead.</i>
  +
